title: Contribute to GENMRKT
lede: Help teach agentic AI classes in underserved communities. Start at any level, get upskilled, then teach with confidence.
scopeChips: Teach students with guided lesson kits
impactOneLiner: You build your own AI skills first, then help students gain practical, ethical AI capability they can use right away.
ctaLabel: Apply to join the teaching cohort
